article: chinese cyclist zeng liqing and horse rider xu unk have each been banned for two years from all competitions for doping offences , the chinese olympic committee -lrb- coc -rrb- was quoted by state media as saying wednesday .
abstract: china bans cyclist and horse rider for doping
